scripts.test: HAIBUN_O_WEBPLAYWRIGHT_MONITOR=each HAIBUN_O_OUTXUNIT_STORAGE=StorageFS HAIBUN_O_A11YSTEPPER_STORAGE=StorageFS HAIBUN_KEY=test HAIBUN_O_WEBPLAYWRIGHT_STORAGE=StorageFS HAIBUN_O_WEBPLAYWRIGHT_CAPTURE_VIDEO=true haibun-cli tests
scripts.test-debug: HAIBUN_O_HTTPEXECUTORSTEPPER_LISTEN_PORT=${HAIBUN_O_HTTPEXECUTORSTEPPER_LISTEN_PORT:-8125} HAIBUN_O_HTTPEXECUTORSTEPPER_ACCESS_TOKEN=${HAIBUN_O_HTTPEXECUTORSTEPPER_ACCESS_TOKEN:-localTest} HAIBUN_O_OUTXUNIT_STORAGE=StorageFS HAIBUN_O_A11YSTEPPER_STORAGE=StorageFS HAIBUN_O_WEBPLAYWRIGHT_STORAGE=StorageFS HAIBUN_O_WEBPLAYWRIGHT_MONITOR=each haibun-cli -c tests/config-debug.json tests
